welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wixom, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Run Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Run Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit City Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
